@litecoin @greg16676935420 4/ This left the Dogecoin community in need of a new CEO. In 2021, they attempted to appoint Billy Markus as the new CEO, but he declined. During this period of uncertainty, a virtual figure named Greg appeared, claiming to be Dogecoin’s new CEO.

@litecoin @greg16676935420 3/ So, he was very grateful to Dogecoin for helping him gain popularity during that period. As a result, once Musk became financially successful, he kept "Dogecoin CEO" in his Twitter bio from 2019 onward.

Later, due to regulatory issues, Musk removed this title.
